Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed black with trace of floral motif in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of possible lion or sphinx (part of forelegs remaining) to left.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0467) (phase 2)
